verses.name: Hebrews 9:23
verses.text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these.

verses.name: Hebrews 9:24
verses.text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands, which are the figures of the true; but into heaven itself, now to appear in the presence of God for us:

verses.name: Hebrews 9:25
verses.text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often, as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others;
